example.text: ICYMI: Yesterday, [[user]] informed [[user]] that the Agency would no longer be giving a $200M grant to Microvast, a company with ties to the Chinese Communist Party. On no account should our tax dollars be funding a company with ties to CCP. [[url]]
I thank Chairman Graves and Ranking Member Larsen for incorporating our work into this package.
Today, [[user]] passed HR 2- the Secure the Border Act. America’s immigration system is broken and the situation at our southern border can be described with one word: crisis. Read more below?? :
